Name: Thorn Hoodie
Description: Embrace the darkness with our signature Thorn Hoodie. Crafted from premium heavyweight fleece with crimson rose embroidery across the chest. Features an oversized fit, distressed details, and ribbed cuffs. This is comfort that doesn't compromise on edge.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Black Rose Sherpa
Description: Luxury meets warmth in this statement sherpa jacket. Black fleece exterior with crimson rose embroidery, lined with ultra-soft sherpa. Oversized fit with snap closures and deep pockets. A piece that turns heads while keeping you cozy.
Care Instructions: Dry clean only

Name: Gothic Dress
Description: Floor-length gothic elegance reimagined for the streets. Features a fitted bodice, flowing skirt, and signature rose detailing. Crafted from premium stretch fabric that moves with you. Dress it up or down—this piece adapts to your energy.
Care Instructions: Hand wash cold, hang dry

Name: Distressed Tee
Description: Vintage-washed tee with our iconic black rose graphic. Pre-distressed for that lived-in feel from day one. Soft, breathable cotton that gets better with every wash. A staple for layering or solo statements.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Crimson Beanie
Description: Keep warm in style with this ribbed knit beanie featuring embroidered crimson rose. Premium acrylic blend that's soft, stretchy, and built to last through winters. The perfect finishing touch to any outfit.
Care Instructions: Hand wash cold, lay flat to dry

Name: Shadow Joggers
Description: Elevated loungewear meets street style. Tapered fit joggers in premium black cotton blend with subtle rose embroidery at the thigh. Elastic waistband with drawstring, deep pockets, and ribbed cuffs. Comfort you can wear anywhere.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Leather Jacket
Description: Premium vegan leather jacket with crimson rose embroidery on the back. Classic moto styling with modern cuts. Features quilted panels, asymmetric zip, and gunmetal hardware. A forever piece that only gets better with age.
Care Instructions: Spot clean only, professional leather care recommended

Name: Rose Cap
Description: Six-panel unstructured cap with embroidered rose detail. Adjustable strap back for perfect fit. Premium cotton twill that breaks in beautifully. Your new everyday essential.
Care Instructions: Spot clean only

Name: Combat Boots
Description: Lace-up combat boots with platform sole and signature rose hardware. Premium vegan leather upper with cushioned insole. These aren't just boots—they're a statement. Built for comfort, designed for impact.
Care Instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth

Name: Ripped Jeans
Description: High-waisted black denim with strategic rips and rose embroidery patches. Stretch fabric for comfort, rigid structure for shape. These jeans have lived a thousand lives before you even put them on.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold inside out, tumble dry low

Name: Rose Hoodie
Description: Oversized hoodie in dusty rose with vintage wash. Features our Love Hurts heart graphic with thorns. Premium heavyweight fleece that feels like a warm hug. Pair with matching joggers or your favorite jeans.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Heartbreak Dress
Description: Midi dress in dusty rose with corset-style lacing and distressed hem. Soft jersey knit that drapes beautifully. Wear it to brunch, a concert, or wherever your heart takes you. Vulnerability never looked so good.
Care Instructions: Hand wash cold, hang dry

Name: Emotional Crewneck
Description: Vintage-washed crewneck with Love Hurts typography. Soft, lived-in feel from the first wear. Slightly cropped fit that pairs perfectly with high-waisted bottoms. Because feelings are meant to be worn, not hidden.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Love Hurts Tee
Description: Soft vintage-washed tee with our signature Love Hurts graphic. Relaxed fit, slightly cropped. The kind of tee that becomes part of your identity. Layer it, knot it, or wear it classic.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Pink Beanie
Description: Ribbed knit beanie in dusty rose with embroidered heart detail. Soft acrylic blend that's warm without being bulky. The finishing touch your winter wardrobe needs.
Care Instructions: Hand wash cold, lay flat to dry

Name: Distressed Joggers
Description: Tapered joggers in dusty rose with intentional distressing. Premium cotton blend with elastic waist and cuffs. Heart embroidery at the thigh. Loungewear that understands you.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Castle Jacket
Description: Cropped denim jacket in light wash with Love Hurts embroidery on back. Classic fit with modern details. Distressed edges and vintage hardware. Your new layering essential.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold inside out, tumble dry low

Name: Heart Cap
Description: Dusty rose six-panel cap with embroidered heart. Adjustable strap, unstructured fit. Premium cotton that softens with wear. Simple, sentimental, essential.
Care Instructions: Spot clean only

Name: Platform Boots
Description: Lace-up platform boots in dusty rose with chunky sole. Vegan leather upper, cushioned footbed. Comfort meets height meets style. Walk taller, feel bolder.
Care Instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth

Name: Vintage Jeans
Description: High-waisted jeans in light wash with heart patches. Relaxed fit with just the right amount of stretch. Soft, broken-in feel from day one. Denim that moves with your emotions.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold inside out, tumble dry low

Name: Foundation Blazer
Description: Oversized blazer in black with gold button details. Sharp shoulders, cinched waist, impeccable drape. This is the piece that transforms your entire wardrobe. From boardroom to bar, you're covered.
Care Instructions: Dry clean only

Name: Icon Trench
Description: Classic trench coat reimagined. Water-resistant fabric with gold hardware and signature lining. Double-breasted, belted waist, storm flap. Investment dressing at its finest.
Care Instructions: Dry clean only

Name: Silhouette Dress
Description: Midi dress in black with gold zipper detail. Clean lines, perfect drape, effortless elegance. From office to evening with a simple shoe swap. This is the dress you reach for when you need to feel unstoppable.
Care Instructions: Dry clean recommended, or hand wash cold

Name: Gold Label Tee
Description: Heavyweight cotton tee with subtle gold label at chest. Perfect fit, premium hand feel, made to last. The foundation of every great outfit. Available in black, white, and grey.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Signature Shorts
Description: Tailored shorts in black with gold button. Clean lines, perfect length, elevated comfort. These aren't gym shorts—these are statement shorts. Pair with the Foundation Blazer for power moves.
Care Instructions: Dry clean only

Name: Premium Hoodie
Description: Black hoodie with gold zipper and subtle signature embroidery. Premium heavyweight fleece, slightly oversized fit. Luxury loungewear that travels from home to street seamlessly.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Luxury Joggers
Description: Tapered joggers in black with gold drawstring details. Premium cotton blend, perfect drape. These joggers understand the assignment: look expensive, feel incredible.
Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: Designer Sneakers
Description: Minimalist sneakers in black and white with gold accents. Premium leather upper, cushioned sole, signature detailing. The sneakers that work with everything in your closet.
Fabric Composition: Leather upper, rubber sole with gold details
Care Instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth

Name: Gold Cap
Description: Black six-panel cap with embroidered gold logo. Structured fit, premium fabric, adjustable closure. Simple, clean, unmistakably SkyyRose.
Care Instructions: Spot clean only

Name: Tailored Pants
Description: High-waisted tailored pants in black with subtle gold button. Straight leg, cropped ankle, impeccable construction. These pants mean business (but they're fun at parties too).
Care Instructions: Dry clean only
